name: lo1res2
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: eqeltrrd(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), clo1, cres(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), c0), w0)

comment: The restriction of a function is eventually bounded if the original is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
